name: The Lost Souls (itch) (JN5 Games)
description:
The Lost Souls is a small horror game based around entities that have lost their way.
Will you become one of them or recover who you are?

The Lost Souls is a work in progress that has taken a while for me to pick up and is my main focus!

The target platform is Windows but I do hope to bring some more builds in the future soon

There will be more Alpha builds and Demo type builds in the future!
